base

Class IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • base.NeighborGraphBase<S,java.util.List<S>>
      • base.IndexedNeighborGraphBase<S>
        • base.IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - The vertex type on which the graph structure is defined.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraph<S>, IndexedNeighborGraph<S>, NavigableRootedNeighborGraph<S>, NeighborGraph<S>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BreadthFirstNeighborGraphBuilder

    public class IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase<S>
extends IndexedNeighborGraphBase<S>
implements IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraph<S>
    Extension of IndexedNeighborGraphBase<S> which serves as a base implementation of the IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraph<S> interface.

    The constructors for this class are designed to be called by the constructors of its subclasses, and ultimately the builder subclasses (ie those which implement the ModifiableNeighborGraph<S> interface).

    The setFinished() method, inherited from IndexedNeighborGraph<S>, is designed to be called within the implementation of the finish() method of the builder subclasses. A call to this method method sets the building state of the graph to finished, and sorts the neighbor lists according to the indexing of the vertices.

    This class has two protected fields, shellSizes and shellStartVertices, which are used to implement the NavigableRootedNeighborGraph<S> interface. Builder subclasses need to be implemented so as to:
    (i) index the vertices of the graph in insertion order by appropriately modifying the indexing field, and
    (ii) modify shellSizes and shellStartVertices appropriately as the graph is being modified.
    Author:
    pdokos

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> shellSizes
      List of sizes of consecutive radial shells.
      protected java.util.List<S> shellStartVertices
      A List, over consecutive radial shells, of the first vertex in each shell (according to the indexing).

      Constructor for an IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase which is of uniform vertex degree (i.e. a regular graph).
      IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase(S root, int numVerts, int degree)
      Constructor for an IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase which has a known number of vertices and is of uniform vertex degree (i.e. a regular graph).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDistanceFromTheRoot(S s)
      Returns the path-distance of s from the root.
      int getMaxDistanceFromRoot()
      Returns the maximum path-distance from the root, among all vertices of the graph.
      java.util.List<S> getNeighborsInNextShell(S s)
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the neighbors of s which are one unit farther from the root than s, if the graph contains s.
      java.util.List<S> getNeighborsInPreviousShell(S s)
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the neighbors of s which have distance from the root one unit less than that of s, if the graph contains s.
      java.util.List<S> getNeighborsInSameShell(S s)
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the neighbors of s which are of the same distance from the root as s, if the graph contains s.
      S getRoot()
      Returns the designated root vertex of the graph.
      java.util.List<S> getShell(int d)
      Returns an unmodifiable view of the list of vertices of path-distance d from the root, ordered by index.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase

        public IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase(S root)
        Constructor for an IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase. This constructor initializes the neighborsMap to a new HashMap<S, T>, initializes the Indexing<S> and IndexComparator<S>, and also initializes the shellSizes and shellStartVertices Lists.
        Parameters:
        root - the designated root vertex of the graph.

      • IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase

        public IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase(S root,
                                       int degree)
        Constructor for an IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase which is of uniform vertex degree (i.e. a regular graph). This constructor initializes the neighborsMap to a new HashMap<S, T>, initializes the Indexing<S> and IndexComparator<S>, and also initializes the shellSizes and shellStartVertices Lists.
        Parameters:
        root - the designated root vertex.
        degree - the designated valency of each vertex.

      • IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase

        public IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase(S root,
                                       int numVerts,
                                       int degree)
        Constructor for an IndexedNavigableRootedNeighborGraphBase which has a known number of vertices and is of uniform vertex degree (i.e. a regular graph). This constructor initializes the neighborsMap to a new HashMap<S, T> with initial capacity numVerts and load factor 1, and also initializes the Indexing<S> and IndexComparator<S>.
        Parameters:
        root - the designated root vertex.
        numVerts - the designated number of vertices of the graph.
        degree - the designated valency of each vertex.
